title: Onsite playground, Vaulted ceilings, Private balcony or patio
neighborhood: 285 E Del Amo Blvd, Carson, CA
posting_body: ['Evolve South Bay is a place where we collaborate with our residents to redefine apartment living.', 'Our vibrant community, located in the heart of Carson, offers an exciting and engaging lifestyle with refined amenities in our new development apartment homes.', 'Each one of our pet friendly apartment homes come fully equipped with energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, private balconies, in-home washer and dryer, and much more.', '-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi and private offices Featured amenity', '-Onsite playground', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with cabanas Photo Featured amenity', '-Outdoor social lounge featuring barbecue pavilion and firepits', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Ceiling fans in living areas', '-Close proximity to beaches, LAX, sporting venues, and restaurants', '-Gourmet kitchen island', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Courtyard with recreational games available', '-Private balcony or patio', '-Oversized walk-in closets', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
